content.question: Contemporary manufacturing is characterized by

choices.label: production facilities that are generally located as close as possible to the sites of raw material production
strong unions and localized involvement in all facets of the production process
spatial disaggregation of the production process
reliance on highly skilled labor at all phases of the production process
production facilities located close to railroads

content.answer: spatial disaggregation of the production process

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
